snippet.title: Mall Craze - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Mall Craze is now LIVE on Kickstarter! 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/mallcraze/mall-craze-shopping-center-management-game

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1223530?utm_source=MallCrazeYT

Months of preparations and waiting are over! :)
Grab one of the Early Bird rewards - the game itself (once it's released on Steam) or beta access!

Thank you VERY much for your support over the last 18 months!

What is Mall Craze?
Have you ever walked into your local mall and thought: “How cool it would be if I could build all of this by myself?!”

In Mall Craze, the possibilities are up to you! Mall Craze is a shopping center management game where you build, customize, and manage your very own mall!

Build, Customize, Manage – these are the three main building blocks that shape up your experience in Mall Craze. Master these, and you will become one of the greatest tycoon giants of all time!
